items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty
items.body: I got this for my elderly mother and she loved it. Not a heavy fabric so she layers it. Nice color. Read more
items.author: Mary

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality
items.body: Great quality for the price! It’s not too thick or thin. I was able to wash and dry and it kept the shape without having to iron. Read more
items.author: LSJ

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, gets lots of compliments; colors are vibrant and cardigan is true to size
items.body: This sweater is true to size and absolutely adorable. Every time I wear it, I get compliments: "wow, that's your color", "wow, that style looks really good on you", etc. I've even gotten: "Can you get me one for Christmas?" The colors are as vibrant as they look online. I like how there's not just a color pattern but also different patterns in the stitching. This cardigan looks really good with white jeans for a casual outing, but also works with navy slacks for business casual. The weave is lightweight, meaning that this is a sweater for cuteness more than warmth. That's perfectly ok here in SE Texas where we have two seasons: summer and January. The only reason I gave it a 4 instead of a 5 is that it can wrinkle a bit and sometimes needs a quick toss in the dryer or a kiss of the steam iron. However, I highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Kim of Glover Gardens

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it!
items.body: Great quality and fits true to size. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Laffitte

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Much nicer than expected! Exactly as shown, pattern is beautiful, runs true to size Read more
items.author: Nichole

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable!
items.body: Very pretty sweater. Amazon shipping took over a week when it should have arrived in 48hrs but they kept me updated on it's whereabouts so I'm not mad about it. It's not too thick but not thin either. The pattern is super sweet. It honestly looks exactly like the pictures. It looks like something I'd have bought at the Gap in the 1990's. Absolutely adorable. I love that the styles I wore in my younger days is coming back! Great quality. Sizing is spot on. The sleeves aren't tight but I always order a size up in cardigans because I live in the southeastern US & don't really need coats - I wear sweaters with long sleeve shirts in the winter. It's very soft! I'm really glad I didn't cancel it when the shipping was delayed! Read more
items.author: ScottsIrishNC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This floral knit cardigan is both charming and practical...
items.body: This floral knit cardigan is both charming and practical — the material is soft, medium weight, and perfect for layering in fall or cool spring weather. The button-down front and crew neck give it a classic look, while the floral design adds a touch of femininity without being over the top. It fits true to size and drapes nicely without feeling bulky, making it easy to pair with jeans, skirts, or even workwear. The knit feels well-made and holds its shape after washing; overall, a cozy and stylish sweater that works beautifully for everyday wear or casual outings. Read more
items.author: HD

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent dupe for expensive sweater
items.body: I should have paid more attention to the pictures. You can see where the flowers don’t line up along the seams. Otherwise, it’s a pretty, lightweight sweater and a good dupe for one that’s is $138. It runs slightly small, so I’d say if you’re in between sizes, size up. Read more
items.author: ADWS

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
